betterquesting.desc: This blood seems pretty common, but she had advanced magic abilities. I'm sure I can use this as a medium.

betterquesting.name: Reactor material
betterquesting.desc: This stuff is interesting... Maybe I can use it as a wand conductor?

betterquesting.name: Centi-vis
betterquesting.desc: Many advanced machines require vis in order to do what they're supposed to. But using a wand as some sort of battery to transfer vis from a node to your machine didn't work as expected. What if you could rip open a node?

betterquesting.name: Bring it home
betterquesting.desc: You probably have a nice collection of bookmarked nodes. But running around to recharge your wand(s) isn't really the way an adept thaumaturge should get his required vis. Moving nodes is not that hard, but without doubt, you need something to protect them from each other.

betterquesting.name: Automated wand-recharge
betterquesting.desc: So you found a way to gather nodes now. What about automated wand recharge? Wouldn't that be extremely convenient?

betterquesting.name: Centi-vis stuff
betterquesting.desc: You totally should get yourself some centi-vis things to transport and use the vis from stabilized nodes.

betterquesting.name: The dark realm
betterquesting.desc: We found the way... my precious. We found it! Only need 4 tasty eyes, and some magic to open the door. The secret door, they didn't see it. Hehehe! All the time. It was there... Aaaall the time!

betterquesting.name: They see me, they watch me
betterquesting.desc: Eyes. Yes. Eyes! I need eyes, my precious. Not spidery ones, no. Nasty hairy things. Don't taste good. Eldritch eyes! I will rip those from their bodies.

betterquesting.name: Really (Really!) dark magic
betterquesting.desc: Fools. FOOLS I say! They know nothing! This book will guide me, yes. Yes it will, my precious. It will lead us to even more POWER!

betterquesting.name: Secrets
betterquesting.desc: I can feel it. Yess. Yeeeess. We will gain more power nigh. Nigh! Yes. My precious. The voices gave me a hint, there is a dimension filled with unbelievable sources of magic energy. I must go there. I must! The crimson people know the secret. I will rip them aparrrt.. They will tell me!

betterquesting.name: Find the key
betterquesting.desc: No, nooo! They have hidden it! Must find the keeey. Must find it! We need the tablet to open the door my precious.

betterquesting.name: The power of creation
betterquesting.desc:
What... What am I doing here? Where am I?! What is this place?! Oh those headaches... (It seems that the pulsating pearl you just found cured your brain from... something. Something old, probably some kind of trap to keep away unworthy ones.)

/iskamiunlocked will tell you if you have successfully unlocked Kami.  If not, try researching the Thaumium Crowbar and the Cursed Spirits Blade.

betterquesting.name: Concentrated darkness
betterquesting.desc: For some reason, you decided to infuse darkness into a seed. It appeared to be promising. For what? You don't know...

betterquesting.name: "Armor"
betterquesting.desc: This new metal, it's so... appealing. You feel comfortable while holding it, so why not get yourself some armor? What could go wrong? It sure will protect you.

betterquesting.name: What could possibly go wrong?
betterquesting.desc: 256 essentia in one block! Now that is what I call storage. Does make weird sounds, but I guess it's nothing special...

betterquesting.name: Let's try this
betterquesting.desc: Mortals. Pah. What do they know about REAL power. The voices tell me I need to focus on alienis and tenebrae if I want to advance. So what about food?

betterquesting.name: An appropriate weapon
betterquesting.desc: My new armor needs an appropriate weapon to go along with. I should make something to fire creatures of the nether at enemies!

betterquesting.name: Improved armor: Ninja style
betterquesting.desc: Time to get some decent armor. With this, those infernal monsters won't be as much of a pain as they are now.

betterquesting.name: Little helpers
betterquesting.desc: A state of the art thaumaturge doesn't work any more. He has little helpers. Golems can and will do all the things for you, just as you command them.

betterquesting.name: Slightly better
betterquesting.desc: Wood is somewhat better than straw. They are still to be considered weak, but an ideal little cutie for farms.

betterquesting.name: Sticks and stones...
betterquesting.desc: ...will break your bones! These guys are hard as rock (Insert audience laugh here) and will protect your claim as good as possible.

betterquesting.name: The best of all
betterquesting.desc:
Highly durable, can carry a lot of items and is considered the "top tier" golem. But you are sure there is more...

You'll need to chisel a thaumium block to get the right kind you need for the golem.

betterquesting.name: Essentia storage
betterquesting.desc: Sure, you could just go with gazillions of jars, but it's way more convenient to store essentia in a chest or barrel. Isn't it?

betterquesting.name: The basic elements
betterquesting.desc: Of course you know where and how to get the basic essentia types. Do you..?

betterquesting.name: Essentia transmission
betterquesting.desc:
What if... you could send essentia from a different location to your infusion matrix? You could finally get rid of all those jars around your altar. Also, there might be an additional use for those mirrors.

You have an intuition that a more energetic metal would allow for very interesting uses.

betterquesting.name: (Almost) automated essentia
betterquesting.desc: By combining the essentia locus, the essentia mirror and an essentia aggregator, you are now able to transmit essentia from almost anywhere. Fancy essentia-storage facility incomming!

betterquesting.name: Essentia monitoring
betterquesting.desc: Manually checking your jars can be tedious, especially if you want to infuse a bunch of stuff at once. Luckily, the essentia locus can help you with that, as it monitors all jars that have been targeted with a crystalline eye.

betterquesting.name: Cleaning the goo
betterquesting.desc: As you do more and more infusions, you're getting tired of removing all the flux that's generated. The shovel of the purifier will help you cleaning up flux, and is a must-have.

betterquesting.name: One does not simply...
betterquesting.desc:
...play with magic. Be warned, these fires are very dangerous! But who doesn't want a patch of snow in the nether?

�4Fire spread is disabled in the configs of servers to prevent massive lag and world destruction.

betterquesting.name: Useful plant life
betterquesting.desc: While regular plants are mostly used to make food, you are wondering if you could get some... "more useful" plant life going...

betterquesting.name: Pushing the limits
betterquesting.desc: Regular enchantments have a limit, like III for Fortune. Utilizing magic, you should be able to bypass that limitation, at least a tiny bit; Eventually creating enchantments like Fortune IV. It comes with limitations, but your book shall tell you more about those.

betterquesting.name: Enchanting like a pro
betterquesting.desc: Finally, a device where you can actually choose which enchantments you want to have. Powered by vis, it can create the most powerful combinations one could imagine.

betterquesting.name: Crying obsidian...
betterquesting.desc: ...it mourns the dead. This might come in handy for some cases. By placing 2 on top of each other, you're able to set your respawn point to that location, without the need for a bed. It's up to you to imagine the possibilities...

betterquesting.name: Useful trees
betterquesting.desc: Just like plants, there are trees that will attract various friendly and "not so friendly" creatures. (No warranty when placed in desolated biome!)

betterquesting.name: The power of gods
betterquesting.desc: The pearl you've found has some interesting effects on you. Not only are the voices almost gone, somehow it has also expanded your perception. You can "feel" the magic around you. This is definitely worth some further investigation.

betterquesting.name: The final goal
betterquesting.desc: Thanks to your help I have managed to create the ultimate energy source: An encased wormhole that drains energy from a synthesized pocket universe, to the point when it reaches heat death. I have no use for it, so you may have it. Thank you for making my dream come true!

betterquesting.name: Shards of opposite worlds
betterquesting.desc: This morning, you just wanted to facepalm yourself to death. During your past journeys, you have already seen strangely colored shards. But unlike the primal shards you use every day, these seem to contain the raw essence of their dimension. Heaven and Hell... so to speak. Two opposite worlds.

betterquesting.name: Unleashed the power
betterquesting.desc: To make use of your armor to the fullest extent, you'll have to unleash its hidden power. This is not an easy task; But it's worth the effort!

betterquesting.name: Unbreakable cowl
betterquesting.desc: It will never break. How convenient.

betterquesting.name: Unleashed the power
betterquesting.desc: To make use of your armor to its full extent, you'll have to unleash its hidden power. This is not an easy task; But it's well worth the effort!

betterquesting.name: Unbreakable leggings
betterquesting.desc: They will never break. How convenient.

betterquesting.name: Unleashed the power
betterquesting.desc: To make use of your armor to its full extent, you'll have to unleash its hidden power. This is not an easy task; But it's well worth the effort!

betterquesting.name: Unbreakable robe
betterquesting.desc: It will never break. How convenient.

betterquesting.name: Infused cloth
betterquesting.desc: By combining ichor with enchanted fabric, you've created something that could be compared to mithril. Light as wool, but durable like steel. Also, it conducts magic energy like nothing else you've seen before. This seems to be an excellent material for a new type of armor.

betterquesting.name: Unleashed the power
betterquesting.desc: To make use of your armor to its full extent, you'll have to unleash its hidden power. This is not an easy task; But it's well worth the effort!

betterquesting.name: Unbreakable boots
betterquesting.desc: They will never break. How convenient.

betterquesting.name: Unbreakable axe
betterquesting.desc: An axe made of your new metal will never break and will accept enchantments with ease. Something tells you there must be more...

betterquesting.name: Infused Thaumium
betterquesting.desc: By combining ichor with some thaumium, the metal turned into something new; Something extremely durable but also soft. Its magic conductivity is incredible

betterquesting.name: Unbreakable Sword
betterquesting.desc: A sword made of your new metal will never break and will accept enchantments with ease. Something tells you there must be more...

betterquesting.name: Unbreakable
betterquesting.desc: A pickaxe made of your new metal will never break and will accept enchantments with ease. Something tells you there must be more...

betterquesting.name: Unbreakable shovel
betterquesting.desc: A shovel made of your new metal will never break and will accept enchantments with ease. Something tells you there must be more...

betterquesting.name: Unleashed the power
betterquesting.desc: To make use of your tool to its full extent, you'll have to unleash its hidden power. This is not an easy task; But it's well worth the effort!

betterquesting.name: Unleashed the power
betterquesting.desc: To make use of your tool to its full extent, you'll have to unleash its hidden power. This is not an easy task; But it's well worth the effort!

betterquesting.name: Unleashed the power
betterquesting.desc: To make use of your tool to its full extent, you'll have to unleash its hidden power. This is not an easy task; But it's well worth the effort!

betterquesting.name: Unleashed the power
betterquesting.desc: To make use of your tool to its full extent, you'll have to unleash its hidden power. This is not an easy task; But it's well worth the effort!

betterquesting.name: Hold all the foci
betterquesting.desc: Hermione's first years bag.

betterquesting.name: Where do the items go?
betterquesting.desc: It's probably better not to ask...

betterquesting.name: Magical waystones
betterquesting.desc: These are used to mark locations in order to teleport around

betterquesting.name: Why walk...
betterquesting.desc: ...when you can teleport? This little device allows you to teleport around almost for free. Is it cheaty? Is it OP? Nope, it's a celestial gateway!

betterquesting.name: Fire burn and...
betterquesting.desc:
In order to get started with your basic witchery needs, you need a witches oven. It requires anointing paste, which you will need an MV mixer to make.

The witches oven is used to get the most basic ingredients for your recipes - Fumes.

The oven is able to capture the by-products produced in the cooking process. Activating the oven to show the interface screen, you will see an additional slot to the right of the fuel slot. Clay jars must be placed in this slot. If there are clay jars present when something is cooked, there is a chance a by-product will be captured in one of the jars. These by-products are important ingredients in other recipes. If there are no clay jars in the oven when something is cooked, no by-products will be produced.

Upgrading an Oven

An oven can be upgraded by placing either a Fume Funnel or a Filtered Fume Funnel to the left and right of it. Each Fume Funnel will increase the cooking speed by and additional 10 per cent (over a furnace) and increase the chance of a by-product being produced by and additional 25 per cent for a Fume Funnel or 30 per cent for a Filtered Fume Funnel.
An Oven can use at most two upgrades and they must have the same facing as the oven.

A fully upgraded oven will therefore cook at 130 per cent speed (compared to a furnace) and have a chance of a by-product of 90 per cent.

betterquesting.name: Offerings
betterquesting.desc:
For all your offering needs. And of course, it looks fancy!

An altar is created by placing six altar blocks in a 2x3 pattern; you will know it is correct when a red cloth appears over the top of the altar.

Activating the altar by right-clicking on it will bring up a screen showing how much power the altar has collected, how much it can collect and its current recharge rate. It is important to check that there is sufficient available power to perform a given rite or use a distillery or kettle recipe.

The maximum amount of power available is determined by how many natural items are in the vicinity of the altar: dirt, grass, trees, plants, etc. all contribute; stone and sand do not. The important thing is to have a diverse mix of different plants, trees and crops (plants from other mods are supported to an extent as well).

Certain objects (or foci), placed onto an altar, will boost the focusing capabilities of an altar, either improving the amount of magic it can focus, the rate at which it replenishes or the range it can distribute power. Only one of each type of item (skull, chalice, etc.) will have an effect. There may also be other less savory foci that dark magic practitioners could make use of.

betterquesting.name: ...Cauldron bubble
betterquesting.desc:
The second thing you'll need is a cauldron. It is used to craft most of the basic items, like mutandis.

It is made by placing a regular Cauldron in the world, and then using Anointing Paste on it.

To brew a potion, cast a ritual or create an item, the cauldron must first be filled with water. This can be achieved by using three buckets of water on it, pumping water into it using pipes, or by using a Dispenser containing a Brew of Endless Water.

Once a cauldron is full of water, it must boil. Lighting a fire beneath the cauldron is the only way for this to happen. Using a netherrack block will guarantee the fire does not go out, although if it does go out, it may be set to boil again without any consequences (unlike brewing in a Kettle!).

When the water is boiling, ingredients may be added to the Cauldron (one after another), to create the desired effect. The book, Witches' Brews gives a complete overview of all ingredients and what they can do when added to a brew.

betterquesting.name: Don't touch the needle!
betterquesting.desc: While having not many recipes by itself, the few it has are rather important for your further witchery progression.

betterquesting.name: Probably usable for soup
betterquesting.desc:
But its main purpose is to brew potions and infusions.

A kettle must be set up in the correct way, before it may be used. 

Firstly, a fire must be set under the kettle (netherrack is best for this, but wood will do just as well). 

Next the kettle must be filled by using a Water-filled Bucket on it. 

Thirdly, each of the six ingredients for the brew or infusion must be thrown into the kettle, one at a time (the liquid will change color according to the recipe being used). 

Finally, a glass bottle must be used on the kettle to bottle the resulting brew, this must be done multiple times depending on the recipe.

It is important to keep the fire going constantly while the recipe is being prepared, otherwise it will be ruined. Swirls coming from the kettle is a sign all is well, black smoke (and brown liquid) indicates the brew is ruined. When a brew is ruined, the kettle must be emptied with a glass bottle, or just filled with more water, and the whole process repeated.

When a brew is complete, the liquid will be the color of the resulting brew and will splutter (in addition to white swirls).

Some recipes will require magical energy from a nearby Altar before they are bottled. If the brew is bottled when insufficient energy is available, the brew will be ruined. Black swirls coming from the Kettle is a good sign there is not enough power. A kettle must be within 14 (to 16) blocks of an Altar in order to obtain power from it (it can obtain power only from a single altar).

betterquesting.name: Don't shake it too much
betterquesting.desc: Unlike nitroglycerin, this stuff doesn't explode. But you still shouldn't shake it too much...

betterquesting.name: Spirit coin transfer
betterquesting.desc:
The Potion of Spirit can only made in the spirit world. Wondering how you can get your stuff like the Kettle, Spinning Wheel or Cauldron to the spirit world? Well you can bypass it probably on servers with the enderchets but for single player or a server without any enderchest you can transfer a few coins to the spirit world and buy some stuff. Don't claim the coins until you have already passed to the other side.

You have already collected a few coins in quests. Let's transfer them now and save it in a chest.

It's a repeatable quest so you can do it as long you have enough coins.

betterquesting.name: Circle magic
betterquesting.desc: For circle magic, you need... a circle, obviously. There are 4 types of chalk you can use, and you'll need all of them to proceed.

betterquesting.name: Portable power source
betterquesting.desc: By infusing a stone with fiery magic you can create an "Attuned Stone". These stones can be used to link non-magical devices to the magical currents present...

betterquesting.name: Flying OINKment
betterquesting.desc: You tried, it doesn't fly. And it also doesn't make any OINK sounds, sadly. But there might be some use for it...

betterquesting.name: Nimbus 1999
betterquesting.desc: Not as good as its successor, the 2000'ish model, but still "somehow" useful...

betterquesting.name: Bloodlust: Refined evil
betterquesting.desc: Refined good was out of stock, sorry.

betterquesting.name: Bloodlust: Witches hand
betterquesting.desc: In case you don't like the infernal witches...

betterquesting.name: Bloodlust: Seeping shoes
betterquesting.desc: Who needs an antidote? Now with free fertilizer!

betterquesting.name: Bloodlust: Taglock kits
betterquesting.desc: Get a death protection poppet and get a stack of taglock kits. For all your trolling needs.

betterquesting.name: Bloodlust: Drop of luck
betterquesting.desc: Hard to get, even with that quest. But less of a grind...

betterquesting.name: Bloodlust: "Cain" sword
betterquesting.desc: Serves 2 purposes: Style. And... ah, yeah... Something useful for vampires.

betterquesting.name: Be a vampire; Dress like a fancy person
betterquesting.desc: Sometimes it can be troublesome to get fancy clothing. However, if you prove yourself worthy, you get a set for free.

betterquesting.name: A few more things...
betterquesting.desc:
Ok, I think I have everything I need to assemble the device. Can you assist me with some additional materials? I need to update most of my machines, as these exotic components you got me damaged most of them already. Don't worry, I have a list here.

Most of my circuits burned to a crisp while I was trying to measure the conductivity of these soul and life shards. I need better ones.

Good lord, these mysterious crystals have eaten away my diamond grinding head! How could that happen? Can you get me a better one?

Do you see that pile of chrome over there? No? Neither do I. Because the machine was VAPORIZED! Good that you gave me 2 singularities, the first one... Well... Just get me a better casing, would you?

It seems, that the stabilizers need... stabilizing... But I'm out of field generators. Can you help me with this?

pages:
Conceptual Device:
The Zero-Point-Module.

Hello my friend.
I need you to help me with a pr

betterquesting.name: Hello there
betterquesting.desc: I've observed your pathway, and I have to say, I'm impressed. I might need your help soon, on a big project of mine.

betterquesting.name: Power. So much power!
betterquesting.desc: If only I could harness it... Well, hi there my friend. I need your help with a project of mine. I want to create an immense power source, but I have a few problems that I need to solve first. Will you help me? You will be rewarded.

betterquesting.name: A problem that matters
betterquesting.desc:
I need to open a wormhole. But for that, I need an immense gravitational field. One like those created upon the death of a massive star. But I can't really "kill" a sun for this. I need to compress matter somehow... 
But... How?

betterquesting.name: Now that matters!
betterquesting.desc: Of course! The matter condenser! How come I didn't think of that?

betterquesting.name: I need a stabilizer
betterquesting.desc: Opening the wormhole is one thing, but I need to stabilize it, so it doesn't harm anything. I guess I need something made of crystal. Why? Because I like it fancy. Find me a crystal-based, transparent material with immense power, would you?

betterquesting.name: Shiny!
betterquesting.desc: What in the world is this? This is amazing! I need more of these! They will be an amazing containment material for the wormhole!

betterquesting.name: I'm hungry
betterquesting.desc: What... I work a lot! So get me some food please.

betterquesting.name: It needs a power plug...
betterquesting.desc: Given the fact that I will be able to craft this device, it needs some kind of "plug" to get the power out. I need something to conduct immense amounts of power. I thought about superconductors, but they don't fit with the crystal casing material I have in mind. I need 2 different crystals, one for positive and one for negative charge.

betterquesting.name: Red and blue
betterquesting.desc: Really? A red and blue crystal? How awesome is that! I think I will need 8 of each color, just to be sure.

betterquesting.name: A casing
betterquesting.desc: I need something for the outer shell. Again, a crystal-based material would be best, because I like it shiny. I tested all crystals we know and none of them meet the requirements. I heard you have access to outer space? Can you try to find a suitable material while you're out there?

betterquesting.name: Fancy!
betterquesting.desc: Yes. Yes! That's it! Bring me more of this stuff! I probably need a lot of it...

betterquesting.name: Beyond imagination
betterquesting.desc: What is this? Draconium dust? I wonder if I could use this for something...

betterquesting.name: The power of dragons
betterquesting.desc:
Hey my friend. I got your sample, and I have to say, I'm amazed. This material has a lot of potential, but it's useless at the moment. I have an idea how to turn this into something useful, but I need you to help me with a few problems first.

I need a good handful of that stuff for my research. Please get me some.

betterquesting.name: A hull
betterquesting.desc: First things first, we need a hull. I played around with your sample, and it seems that it reacts with every known material. It even attacks Iridium! It's completely harmless if it's in a box that is open, but as soon as I try to enclose it in something, poof. It breaks free. We need something stronger than iridium my friend.

betterquesting.name: Dense, denser, Neutronium
betterquesting.desc:
Now look at this. This stuff is incredibly dense. Maybe this material will be sufficiently strong?

This looks promising. Send me some samples, and I will try my luck.

betterquesting.name: Not a planet
betterquesting.desc: This place is interesting. Maybe I should try to find new materials here...

Lore: Formerly known as Neutronium
display.Name: Hull debris

betterquesting.name: Successful.. Or not?
betterquesting.desc:
Heh, neutronium. I didn't even know such a thing really exists. Unfortunately, the draconium dust was enclosed for... 5 seconds? But, it was a small success. 

Ok let's travel to some planets and moons and look for the new material. I think we have to fly very far away for it.

Lore: Formerly known as Neutronium
display.Name: Hull debris

betterquesting.name: Black Plutonium
betterquesting.desc:
This doesn't seem to be dense, but it's a material you haven't seen before. Maybe this could be the solution?

Black what? Huh, interesting. Send me some samples, I want to analyse it.

betterquesting.name: We have a hull
betterquesting.desc: Surprisingly, this material is able to contain the draconium dust. It could be the radiation. Good job my friend!

Lore: The first sample. Wait.. Is that... a button?
display.Name: Draconium Dust core

betterquesting.name: Draconium Dust core
betterquesting.desc: I've created a first sample of what I shall call "Draconium Dust core". Not quite the result I expected to be honest, but see for yourself.

Lore: The first sample. Wait.. Is that... a button?
display.Name: Draconium Dust core

betterquesting.name: We need to control it
betterquesting.desc: The problem is that the immense power of this dust is released all at once. We need something to control the vast amount of energies. I noticed that the dust starts to glow when it gets near an aura node. Maybe Thaumaturgy has the solution?

betterquesting.name: The power of primals
betterquesting.desc: What else could control energies better than a focus of crystallized primal energy? With this little item, it should be possible to control the energies released from the dust.

Lore: A mix of draconium dust, a primordial pearl
and.. Is that a bone?
display.Name: Primordial dust

betterquesting.name: Unforeseen consequences
betterquesting.desc: You haven't heard anything in a while from the technician. You have a feeling that something might have gone terrible wrong, so you went to his place to investigate. What you found was... nothing. A void. It seems that he tried to combine the pearl with the dust. What did he say? The dust reacts to aura nodes? Of course it does. It amplifies the energies by a thousand times. And giving it raw primal energy, good lord, what has he done. May he rest in peace...

Lore: A mix of draconium dust, a primordial pearl
and.. Is that a bone?
display.Name: Primordial dust

betterquesting.name: I'm on my own now
betterquesting.desc: I need to continue my research. I still think that this primordial pearl is the key to control the dust, but I'm not sure how. Maybe the pearl is just too strong? I should try to use something that's similar, but less powerful. It reacts to vis, so maybe.. I should try to make a wand focus with that pearl. That way, I could channel vis into the dust without actually combining both.

betterquesting.name: An interesting material
betterquesting.desc: This metal has quite interesting properties. It seems that it has absorbed some of the energy that exists in the End. While ender pearls are quite fragile, this metal is a lot more durable. However, the absorbed energy is not enough to teleport things around. But you might find a solution for this.

betterquesting.name: Gross, what is that...
betterquesting.desc: It's purple, and it smells like rotten eggs. But while staring at this unpleasant fluid, you had an idea. You can't reach the dust directly, but can you actually teleport something in and out the field? Might be worth a try.

betterquesting.name: An appropriate focus
betterquesting.desc: You've tried a lot, and nothing was quite enough to activate the dust. Until now. You finally found a focus that is able to transmit enough power to cause a heavy reaction with the dust, but not enough to cause problems.

betterquesting.name: Activated draconium dust
betterquesting.desc: At least for a short period of time. The wand focus is powerful enough to activate the dust, but it will convert back to regular dust as soon as I stop feeding it with vis. If I only could contain it, surround it with a forcefield...

Lore: Unfortunately, it has already lost its power
display.Name: Activated Draconium Dust

betterquesting.name: The strongest forcefield
betterquesting.desc: In order to create a forcefield, I need to build myself a containment device. I will use only the best emitters I can afford. I will take no risks here.

Lore: A pile of something that
used to be a machine hull
display.Name: MAX Machine Casing (Molten)

betterquesting.name: Not what I expected...
betterquesting.desc: The outcome was... interesting. It did not explode, instead, the activated draconium dust generated a counter-field to mine! Unfortunately, the emitters could not stand the reverse energies, and melted. I was able to shut it off quick enough to save the machine casing (At least what's left from it...) And a couple of field generators.

Lore: A pile of something that
used to be a machine hull
display.Name: MAX Machine Casing (Molten)

Lore: A few scratches here and there,
but still usable
display.Name: Nether Star (Used)

betterquesting.name: Forcefield, second try
betterquesting.desc: I came to the following conclusion: Draconium dust seems to react nicely with all kinds of magic energy, and seems to repel technology. So I need to find a way to create a forcefield with magic alone. There must be a way...

betterquesting.name: A magic force field
betterquesting.desc:
While node stabilizers are too weak, you found a way to generate a strong containment field, generated by magic itself. You tried to use warded glass, but even the "frozen in spacetime" material could not resist the power of activated draconium dust. You decided to build another device, this time with your newest invention.

The vortex attenuator is powerful enough to negate even hungry nodes, and it also will be able to contain activated draconium dust.

Just to be sure, I will add some amplifiers to it.

betterquesting.name: What the...?
betterquesting.desc: The device works! It is able to fully contain and separate the draconium dust from everything around it! Unfortunately... It also prevents the vis from passing the barrier, which results in regular draconium dust... In a forcefield...

Lore: Unfortunately, it has already lost its power
display.Name: Activated Draconium Dust

betterquesting.name: Looking for alternatives
betterquesting.desc:
It is frustrating. Either you are able to contain the dust but can't activate it, or, you activate it and it causes serious damage. Maybe you need to find answers somewhere else.

Draconic... Like... Dragon?

betterquesting.name: Draconic... Like... Dragon?
betterquesting.desc: Maybe you where looking for the right things in the wrong place. As this dust obviously comes from dragons, the best thing to do now is to find answers in the dimension of dragons: The End.

betterquesting.name: Weird creatures
betterquesting.desc: These ghosts are weird beings. But, I found this ectoplasm, which, by itself, seems to be pretty useless.

betterquesting.name: Activated teleport power
betterquesting.desc: By a random guess of yours, you combined molten ender pearls and a few more of these shards with an empty gem, and it turned blue. It is pulsating with power. You tried to use it on your containment device, and it seems to be able to bypass the force field, while keeping it intact that the same time. Sadly, it doesn't have enough power to let vis pass through. Maybe you can even further increase the gems power?

betterquesting.name: Arcane shards
betterquesting.desc: While the normal world is based on vis and primal energy, the End seems to be quite different. This arcane shard is the crystallized form of this energy, just like the primal shards that you used so many times in the past. By pure randomness, you discovered that it reacts with the metal you've found.

Lore: Emits a strong, vibrating aura of pure energy you never experienced before.
In good memory of your old friend, the technician. May he rest in peace

betterquesting.name: Draconic evolution
betterquesting.desc: I found a way to combine technology and magic into something fantastic. A shiny blue emblem that emits immense amount of energy. I've decided to call it the draconic core. Make one for yourself!

Lore: Emits a strong, vibrating aura of pure energy you never experienced before.
In good memory of your old friend, the technician. May he rest in peace

betterquesting.name: Balanced thaumium
betterquesting.desc: This new metal is quite cheap, and has an awesome conductivity towards all 6 primal aspects. Regarding the capsule, I'd say it is a superconductor for vis. I think I can finally assemble the final frame.

betterquesting.name: Automated evolution
betterquesting.desc:
The machine is working pretty well, but it's tedious to fill in the reagents manually. But you have an idea, you could use a few basic components to fully automate the process.

You can use robot arms and conveyor belts to automate the input and output.

Obviously, you need to power the machines. A solar panel will do just fine.

In order to automate the catalyst, you need a few things. One golem will gather basic materials, while the second one will hunt creepers and ghasts for the more valuable ingredients.

You found a way to re-use the singularity, so you only need to get some sand. Luckily, the golem that works on the catalyst will be able to get glass too. He just needs a little additional motivation.

Your golems need light, obviously. Also, it would be nice if there are some signal lamps that indicate the status of the process. Would it not?

betterquesting.name: Activated teleport gem
betterquesting.desc: You are sure that you've just discovered the solution for your containment problem. This gem happily transmits vis on request, while keeping the containment field intact. What a great day!

Lore: Unfortunately, it has already lost its power
display.Name: Activated Draconium Dust

betterquesting.name: You did it! But...
betterquesting.desc:
Now that you are able to contain the activated draconium dust for an infinite amount of time, you where able to assure the energy it releases. The readings are incredible. You have never seen such a power before. The only problem is, the machinery required to keep the dust in this state is too large to use it for crafting.

You noticed something that might help: The dust reacts to vis, but it needs a lot of it, therefore you require the animation focus. If you could find a catalyst, that you can mix the dust with, you could make the dust react with the vis from its surroundings instead of a direct beam.

Lore: Unfortunately, it has already lost its power
display.Name: Activated Draconium Dust

betterquesting.name: A catalyst
betterquesting.desc:
That's it. This catalyst contains all primal energies in a quite different form, a lot weaker than any node. However, in combination with the draconium dust, it amplifies the vis that's around it, which leads to a permanent activation. It still needs to be contained, but you don't need the direct vis beam any more.

The result is a compound, which still emits massive amounts of power, but is less destructive. It still attacks the neutronium, but I think if I can find a capsule-like container that has special properties, I could create a portable version of it.

betterquesting.name: Bulma would be proud
betterquesting.desc:
By combining a dimensional singularity with some glass cylinders and molten gold, I was able to create a miniature containment field within a very small area. Interesting enough, the new draconium blend amplifies the containment field from the inside. Once I fill the blend in the capsule, it immediately "seals" itself. I won't be able to remove or replace the dust any more, but I don't think I have to...


The perfect vessel for massive power!

betterquesting.name: The final steps
betterquesting.desc: Now that I've found a way to stabilize the draconium dust and keep it safe in a small capsule, I just need to make a small container for it, so I can drain the energy on demand. Neutronium will serve very well, but I need a magic conductor. Thaumium works, but gets way too hot and void metal has a bad conductivity. I need to find a magic alloy that is more "balanced" in terms of primal aspects

betterquesting.name: Endless evolution
betterquesting.desc: Using your machine, you can now craft infinite amounts of these cores. And since it would be gruesome to let your golem work just for one single core, you decided to only request cores in a large batch of 64. How nice of you.

betterquesting.name: Kill Baba Yaga
betterquesting.desc: Baba Yaga is a witch (or one of a trio of sisters of the same name), who appears as a deformed and/or ferocious-looking elderly woman. She flies around in a mortar and wields a pestle. She dwells deep in the forest, in a hut usually described as standing on chicken legs, with a fence decorated with human skulls. Baba Yaga may help or hinder those that encounter or seek her out.

betterquesting.name: Kill Horned Huntsman
betterquesting.desc: A Horned Huntsman is a member of the Wild Hunt, a powerful entity created by the Horned God. If one is encountered, prepare for a hard fight, or better flee.

betterquesting.name: Kill Ender Dragon
betterquesting.desc: The dragon must die. Long enough he destroyed those precious endstone blocks!

betterquesting.name: Kill Shade of Leonard
betterquesting.desc: Leonard is the demonic being who is rumored to have taught a cadre of German witches their trade, and often presided over their sabbats. A skilled coven with the witches cauldron can summon a Shade of the Demon according to the method described in the Witches' Brews book.

betterquesting.name: Kill Lord of Tormentum
betterquesting.desc: A Lord of Torment is a mighty demonic being that is able to create prisons to torment its victims. Those foolish enough to summon one of these creatures must prepare for an arduous fight.

betterquesting.name: Kill Mog and Gulg
betterquesting.desc: Mog and Gulg are the god-like beings that hobgoblins worship. They may send their avatars to pay witches a visit who exploit their worship (with a statue of hobgoblin patron). Rumor has it that using a nether star may make them take immediate notice.

betterquesting.name: Kill Demon
betterquesting.desc: Demons are powerful, evil beings who dwell in the infernal dimensions. To date, none have been seen roaming the Nether, where their minions: ghasts, blazes and their ilk seem to dominate. To meet a demon without a way to protect oneself is almost certain death. They are known to hit like a proverbial truck, and require a significant amount of damage to kill. Some demons have even been seen shooting fireballs! They are, of course, also immune to fire.

betterquesting.name: The power of infinity
betterquesting.desc: You've mastered everything possible. And now it's time to give your equipment the final boost. The infinity egg is just the right addition to your altar. It's quite expensive, but well worth the cost.

betterquesting.name: Lava for blood
betterquesting.desc: Well, both are red, so that connection was quite obvious... Was it...?

betterquesting.name: Tier 1 slates
betterquesting.desc: The basic slates. Basically just stone with blood infused in it.

betterquesting.name: See all the things
betterquesting.desc: It's quite difficult to see how much blood there is in your altar, or your personal blood network. This little device will solve that problem for you. Just a little prick in the finger, and everything will be revealed.

betterquesting.name: Basic rune
betterquesting.desc:
The basic rune that you can craft at this moment.

You need  8 runes for your tier 2 altar, which can hold more blood, and you can make new recipes now.

betterquesting.name: Alchemy with blood
betterquesting.desc: Not like "blood alchemy". You probably will need more than one later, but for now one is sufficient.

betterquesting.name: Potion catalysts
betterquesting.desc: In order to manipulate potions you need catalysts. You then combine the ingredient you used to get the potion effect in with either a lengthening or power catalyst to increase the duration or the strength of the potion effect.

betterquesting.name: Simple alchemical things
betterquesting.desc: Alchemy can be weird, and tedious. There are a lot of reagents and even more possible combinations. For now, and in order to get started, you need a couple of basic things.

betterquesting.name: Refilling your potions
betterquesting.desc: If empty, you don't have to throw the potion away. Just refill it.

betterquesting.name: Special potion flasks
betterquesting.desc: Regular glass phials are unable to hold these special potions you want. You need to imbue them with some blood from your altar.

betterquesting.name: Potion: Flight mode
betterquesting.desc: Just to give you an idea what is possible. Let's do a sample potion. Shall we? Get yourself a potion flask, a feather and one of your weak binding agents you made. Combine those in the chemistry set, and you'll get something that you'll probably want to keep for a while.

betterquesting.name: Simple, but powerful spells
betterquesting.desc: The simple spell system is rather easy to setup, and can be done early on in your bloodmagic career.

betterquesting.name: Paradigm
betterquesting.desc: Paradigms shape your spell.

betterquesting.name: Spell foci
betterquesting.desc: There are nine basic elements and each has a focus, an item that represents them. You place this focus in your altar next to the spell table in order for your magic to flow through it and the paradigm.

betterquesting.name: Some examples
betterquesting.desc: There are a LOT of spell combinations to discover, so just use trial and error!

betterquesting.name: Convenient slate
betterquesting.desc: Collecting items while mining or chopping wood is always tedious. But no more! With this fancy little thing items will just fly towards you! And it only costs a little bit of blood to pay the spirits of wind to work for you.

betterquesting.name: Tier 3 slates
betterquesting.desc: ...and even more blood.

betterquesting.name: Tier 2 slates
betterquesting.desc: You need MOOORE. Imbue some slates with even more blood.

betterquesting.name: Apprentice orb
betterquesting.desc: Your tier 2 orb.

betterquesting.name: Magican's orb
betterquesting.desc: Your tier 3 orb.

betterquesting.name: Elemental chalk
betterquesting.desc: Creation of better ritual stones.

betterquesting.name: Sacrificial runes
betterquesting.desc: Poking your finger might work for simple slates and runes, but getting enough blood for advanced stuff is tedious. With sacrificial runes you are able to increase the LP gain from mobs or yourself.

betterquesting.name: Tier 3 runes
betterquesting.desc: The first rune to increase your capacity, and a rune to speed up transfer from/to external tanks.

betterquesting.name: Basic rituals
betterquesting.desc: Now that you have access to elemental chalk, you can get yourself the basic ritual diviner. A convenient way to place simple but yet complex magical rituals.

betterquesting.name: Powerful armor
betterquesting.desc: A long way to go, and rather expensive, but a really powerful armor and well worth the effort.

betterquesting.name: Getting soul shards
betterquesting.desc: Enable your sword by Shift right-clicking and slay some enemies! Collect as many shards as possible. You will need a ton of them...

betterquesting.name: Bound armor
betterquesting.desc: Time to assemble your armor. You need to build the pattern with blocks as you would craft the armor in a crafting table. The soul forge must connect to the structure on at least 2 sides. Then, right click the forge block with an empty hand to craft the armor piece.

betterquesting.name: A bloodmage's sword
betterquesting.desc: Diamonds and emeralds are limited in their ability to store LP. With this sword, you are able to get the crystallized souls from your enemies. Time to go hunting.

betterquesting.name: Rituals
betterquesting.desc: Time for some rituals. The most basic one you'll probably get first is the ritual of binding.

betterquesting.name: Bound tools: Pickaxe
betterquesting.desc: Mining never was easier. Just right-click with this tool and all the stone is gone! Like all bound tools, this uses a massive amount of LP.

betterquesting.name: Bound tools: Shovel
betterquesting.desc: Ever wanted to clear out a large terrain with dirt, gravel and sand? Why not let demons do it? This shovel, imbued with the soul of a demon will unleash the power by your will. But be warned: The demon you're about to summon with this is thirsty, and it costs a lot of LP to make use of it, so make sure your LP pool is full!

betterquesting.name: Bound tools: Axe
betterquesting.desc: Upon right click while activated, this axe will clear out any wood within a large area. Be warned: This uses a huge amount of LP. You might suffer from sudden death...

betterquesting.name: A true blood-mage
betterquesting.desc: Bloodmagic is fine, so is Thaumcraft. Why not combine both worlds?

betterquesting.name: Complex spell system
betterquesting.desc: Unlike the simple spells with foci and paradigm, the complex spell system is incredibly...complex. There are way too much combinations to cover them here, so it's advised to look for the knowledge in other places. However, with the items from this quest, you are able to craft a simple mining spell.

betterquesting.name: Steam > Tier 2
betterquesting.desc: Three steam lootbags give a better one = Tier 2.

betterquesting.name: §1§lOak trees are not apple trees
betterquesting.desc:
Oak trees which give apples?  Who the hell added this to minecraft? You found a way of combining an oak sapling and an apple to get an apple tree sapling. Try to plant one to get a permanent source of food.

Once you complete this quest, check out the rest of the Quest Tabs. A new one, Coins Coins Coins, has unlocked. Every few quests you want to look through all the quest tabs to make sure something new hasn't unlocked somewhere else! There are lots of tabs, so be sure to scroll down!

betterquesting.name: Basic > Steam
betterquesting.desc: Three basic lootbags give a better one = Steam.

betterquesting.name: §1§l"Backed" potatoes
betterquesting.desc: Eating raw potatoes isn't that healthy, as you might have noticed. Some potatoes are green and poisonous already. After you get a furnace you can make delicious baked potatoes as another food alternative. Put a baked potato on a stick to make it even more delicious.

betterquesting.name: Tier 2 > Tier 3
betterquesting.desc: Three Tier 2 lootbags give a better one = Tier 3.

betterquesting.name: §1§lSoft mallet adventure
betterquesting.desc: You now have some melon slices or pumpkins but what can you do with them? Well just eat them or... use a mallet to get some seeds... OK, let's craft one. Perhaps you can use this mallet for some other things too.

betterquesting.name: Tier 3 > Tier 4
betterquesting.desc: Three Tier 3 lootbags give a better one = Tier 4

betterquesting.name: §1§lShields UP
betterquesting.desc: With a sword in one hand, what can you do with the other? Right, you need a shield. Let's make one.

betterquesting.name: Tier 4 > Tier 5
betterquesting.desc: Three Tier 4 lootbags give a better one = Tier 5.

betterquesting.name: §1§lShield update
betterquesting.desc: Your wooden shield is very weak. So you look for a better one. Looks like you need some leather, so go and find some cows.

betterquesting.name: Tier 5 > Tier 6
betterquesting.desc: Three Tier 5 lootbags give a better one = Tier 6.

betterquesting.name: §1§lYour first long range weapon
betterquesting.desc: Since you can't make any vanilla bow before LV and Tinkers weapons are not in this Tier, you find a way to make a spear out of sticks, leather and a string. Get one because some infernal monsters are easier to kill with a long range weapon.

betterquesting.name: Trigger LoC
betterquesting.desc: Triggered by having a "Lamp of Cinders" in your inventory.

betterquesting.name: Trigger Singularity
betterquesting.desc: Triggered by making a singularity.

betterquesting.name: Trigger Shard of Creation
betterquesting.desc: Triggered by making a "Shard of Creation".

betterquesting.name: Trigger Life and Soul Shard
betterquesting.desc: Triggered by making a "Life Shard" and a "Soul Shard".

betterquesting.name: Trigger Unknown Crystal
betterquesting.desc: Triggered by finding a "Mysterious Crystal".

betterquesting.name: Trigger Life
betterquesting.desc: Triggers the Life Canister Quest after a Wither death.

betterquesting.name: Trigger Pluto
betterquesting.desc: Triggers if you have been on Pluto.

betterquesting.name: Trigger Primordial Pearl
betterquesting.desc: Triggered by the Primordial Pearl.

betterquesting.name: Trigger Wand Focus Animation
betterquesting.desc: Triggers if you craft the Primordial Focus.

betterquesting.name: Trigger Vortex Attenuator
betterquesting.desc: Triggers after you craft a Vortex.

betterquesting.name: Trigger The End Dim
betterquesting.desc: Triggers if you arrived at The End.

betterquesting.name: Trigger Amorphic Catalyst
betterquesting.desc: Triggers if you craft the Catalyst.

betterquesting.name: Runes tier 2
betterquesting.desc: Speed rune is the only tier 2 rune. The speed rune does what its name implies, provides an additive 20% increase to the processing speed of the blood altar.

betterquesting.name: The technician part 2
betterquesting.desc: I will ask the technician about this stuff, but I need to reach a good reputation first. He is a busy man, and I don't want to be denied.

betterquesting.name: Trigger Neutronium Ore
betterquesting.desc: Triggers if you get Neutronium Ore.

betterquesting.name: Trigger Black Plutonium Ore
betterquesting.desc: Triggers if you find Black Plutonium.

betterquesting.name: Trigger Empty Void Capsule
betterquesting.desc: Triggers if you have a Void Capsule.

betterquesting.name: Trigger Thauminite Nugget
betterquesting.desc: Triggers if you get Thauminite Nuggets.

betterquesting.name: §1§lCollecting some berries
betterquesting.desc: Are you now waiting for the carrots to grow? Go and find some berry bushes and berries. The berries are a good source of food and you can put these bushes around your house to make a wall. It should provide a good protection against all those monsters that want to come into your house and kill you.

betterquesting.name: §1§lBerry medley
betterquesting.desc: Hmmm... what can you do with all those berries? Just eating? You will see that they have a very low saturation Level. Let's plant the new berry bushes and mix the berries to make some better food.

betterquesting.name: §2§1§lFood variants
betterquesting.desc: Maybe you noticed already that eating the same food too often is very boring and not healthy any more. Some food like tea leaf can be taken to the furnace and processed further. So take a break and drink a cup of tea. Maybe munch some tasty raisins as they are very nice.

betterquesting.name: §2§lYour first tool
betterquesting.desc: When your tinkers tables are ready you can craft your first tool. If you did not find a village yet you can only craft flint tools. Let's start with a pickaxe, an axe and a shovel. At this point swords are unobtainable since they need metals like iron or bronze which you will get at a later stage. In the meantime use your gregtech swords. Your new tools are weak at first but the more you use them the better they will get. They will level up to level 99 if you play long enough. Tool parts can be replaced for a bit of level XP, however the tool must be fully repaired first.

betterquesting.name: §2§lMaking a better sword
betterquesting.desc: Now it's time to make your first tinkers sword. First you have to make blade, hand guard, and tool rod cast forms. Melt some bronze in the smeltery and cast your tool parts. Tadaa... there is your first tinkers sword.

betterquesting.name: §2§k§l§l§r§2§lUpgrade 2.0
betterquesting.desc:
Find iron, copper and tin ore. Very funny... How can you mine these with just a flint pickaxe? 
I have an idea; bring me all the stone you mined with your flint pickaxe and I will give you a better tool head in exchange.

betterquesting.name: §6§lUpgrade #4: Upgrade tier 5 - HSS-G Coils
betterquesting.desc: To process more advanced materials like HSS-E, HSS-S, naquadah or draconium you need more than 4500K. Time to upgrade your EBF to 5400k.

betterquesting.name: §6§lUpgrade #5: Upgrade tier 6 - Naquadah Coils
betterquesting.desc: To process more advanced materials like naquadah-alloy you need more than 5400K. Upgrade your EBF to 7200k to increase the heat.

betterquesting.name: §6§lUpgrade #6: Upgrade tier 7 - Naquadah Alloy Coils
betterquesting.desc: To process the more advanced materials like neutronium or fluxed-electrum  you need more than 7200K. Upgrade your EBF to 9001k. (OVER 9000!!!)

betterquesting.name: §3§lFlint and steel
betterquesting.desc:
After you make steel you are able to craft flint and steel. I guess you want to travel to the Nether as soon as possible but be aware; the Nether is a very dangerous place.
Note: The ball of moss gives a tinker's tool self-repair. But if the tool is completely broke, it will have to repair to full health before fixing the tool.

betterquesting.name: §3§m§l§m§4§3§lTHE NETHER
betterquesting.desc:
Now more dangerous with extra hardcore infernal mobs. Have fun and take care.  Be sure to bring a tough companion along to keep you alive. If you have no friends, why not make an Iron Golem and push it through first, or bring the materials for more along with you?

Also, *when* you die here, not if, your graves will spawn skeletons because of the darkness. Make sure you light up areas where you might die, and when recovering graves light up the area *first* so that you don't end up dying over and over and making a mess.

betterquesting.name: §2§lMalachite
betterquesting.desc:
Another copper source  is "malachite" which can be found between Y level 10 and 40. This vein contains more iron ore variants like "brown limonite", "yellow limonite" and "banded iron ore".

§4Hint:
To see where a special ore can be found click the raw ore in nei and it will show you more details. Works with small ores too.

betterquesting.name: §l§2§lCreosote oil
betterquesting.desc:
I guess you already processed a bit of wood into charcoal and wonder what you can do with all this creosote oil?
Well you can burn it in the normal furnace to cook your food or you can make more torches with it. Later in the LV age you probably should run combustion generators with it.

betterquesting.name: §2§lAnimal farms
betterquesting.desc: Trying to get some leather or wool? You probably need to spend a lot of time hunting animals and traveling around, or you could simply make a farm to get a decent amount of leather, wool and meat. Make sure you don't put too many animals in the pen or they will overcrowd and kill each other.

betterquesting.name: §2§lGardener
betterquesting.desc: If you are wondering: Why do I never get seeds when destroying grass? You are right. Try to work with your new mattock on the grass blocks that do not have water anywhere nearby to find some seeds.

betterquesting.name: §1§lCan you hear the carrots grow?
betterquesting.desc:
Tired of waiting since your carrots grow sooooo slow?
Well I got an idea, bone meal will help you grow food in seconds. Ok, chop down some trees and I will trade you some bone meal.

betterquesting.name: §2§lYou need MOOOOOOORE wood
betterquesting.desc: It's time to feed your new coke oven with some wood to get more charcoal. You are looking for the most efficient way to plant trees. Try to find some spruce saplings and some jungle saplings. Both can be planted in a 2x2 grid to get bigger trees.

betterquesting.name: §2§lTanned leather
betterquesting.desc: You have found a way to make leather more durable and more resistant by further processing it. Make some bound leather from four pieces of leather, some strings and a woven cotton. Now you only have to hang it on a drying rack and wait about 10 minutes to get some tanned leather. Stockpile some for later.

betterquesting.name: §2§lNeed more space?
betterquesting.desc: As you might know: tanned leather is more resistant and good enough for a backpack. Let's get a digger's backpack and a miner's backpack. Each pack holds different items. So use both for your first true back-packed mining experience.

betterquesting.name: §2§lYou need them all!
betterquesting.desc: There are many more backpacks: Hunter, builder, forester...

betterquesting.name: §2§lBetter lunch bag
betterquesting.desc: Your lunch bag is now so abused and rather old so it's time to get something better. Let's craft a lunch box which can hold way more food.

betterquesting.name: Horseback riding
betterquesting.desc: Are you ready for a small trip? With your new lunch box, saddle, lead and of course a horse we can start a small journey. Be sure to make paths over water, horses don't like going over deep water.

betterquesting.name: §2§lSleeping outside
betterquesting.desc: Carrying the bed with you all the time the looks very funny. Why don't you craft a sleeping bag to stay outside without placing a bed and changing your spawn point. This way if you die, you'll be right at home! Be warned: If you play on a server then you'd better sleep below Y level 128, as nights are very cold in the mountains...

betterquesting.name: §2§lSheep hairdresser
betterquesting.desc: Killing sheep to get the wool is so ineffective. Making some shears would make sense if you need more wool.

betterquesting.name: §3§lWire Cutter v.0.2alpha
betterquesting.desc: Small gears require a wire cutter to be made, so let's craft one.

betterquesting.name: §2§lRedstone
betterquesting.desc: If you didnt't find any Redstone veins yet, it is quite important to look for one now. Try your luck at Y level 5-40.

betterquesting.name: §3§lOh, shiny! (Not platinum!)
betterquesting.desc: To make your first macerator you need two diamonds, and to enter the Twilight Forest you need one. Finding a diamond vein would help you a lot. Go and look for one at Y level 5-20.

betterquesting.name: §3§lHow to make rubber
betterquesting.desc:
Making rubber is now more complicated - you need raw rubber and sulfur. Finding a sulfur vein in the Nether seems like a good idea, doesn't it? Found on Y level 5-20. Later on you can get sulfur from chemicals like hydrogren sulfide or pyrite.

§4Sphalerite will be important later for gallium and zinc.

betterquesting.name: §4§3§lLit way to get charred
betterquesting.desc:
You have found an alternative way of making charcoal with a "charcoal pile igniter". 
Go and start getting massive amounts of charcoal.

betterquesting.name: §2§lXP usage?!
betterquesting.desc:
Exploring some dungeons or fighting mobs probably gave you a lot of XP. Better use it to get iron, copper, tin or other useful dusts before you die during the next fight.

Place your tank on the ground and a drain on top. Now you can fill it with XP.

By the way, you discovered that while the seared tank doesn't hold much, it doesn't lose contents when broken, and full tanks can stack. I wonder if that information is useful...

betterquesting.name: Diesel, creosote: Watch them BURN!
betterquesting.desc: You have almost made it. One last crafting step is required in order to advance to tier 2. Keep going!

betterquesting.name: First things first
betterquesting.desc: As usual. In order to get started with bees, you need a few basic things. Most importantly... a scoop. For this quest you want to make a GregTech scoop. Later you can make scoops using magic or even rechargeable scoops.

betterquesting.name: Go find some bees
betterquesting.desc: The next thing to do: Find a few bee hives around the world. There are 11 mundane bees that can be found, of which 8 are located in the Overworld. Any kind of bee will work for this quest.

betterquesting.name: A new home
betterquesting.desc:
Now that you've destroyed the poor bees homes, you should build them a new one. The humble Bee House will not let your bees mutate into new species. But you'll need the combs anyways for better housing.  The production rate isn't too bad, but they cannot be automated.

One tip - Put some vanilla saplings near the Bee Houses. Bee Houses give a natural boost of 3x to pollination vs better housing. The bees will pollinate them and you might get lucky and start getting some Forestry tree crossbreeding. Stick with Oak and Birch trees, they'll give you a nice mix of starter Forestry trees.

betterquesting.name: Analyze them all
betterquesting.desc:
Every bee has multiple properties that define what the bee does, how it behaves in rain or at night, and a couple of other aspects. It is mandatory to keep track of those properties. This kit isn't very good since it doesn't give you information on their Inactive attributes, but waste not, want not.

You'll need to use paper to analyze each bee.

betterquesting.name: Scan or not to scan
betterquesting.desc: In order to get into bee breeding, you need a way to see all the traits, active and inactive. You only want to breed so called "pure" bees; For those, both "Active" and "Inactive" traits are identical.

betterquesting.name: Top-Tier analyser
betterquesting.desc: The best you can get, for all your scanning and analysing needs.

betterquesting.name: To play god
betterquesting.desc:
In order to continue with bees, to mutate and breed them as you like, you need mutagen. This greenish, smelly liquid needs to be refined from bacterial sludge that seems to be available only on Mars. You will be able to continue, once you've arrived there.

In the meantime you can start working with the Genetics mod, since we all know Gendustry is too easy... Check out the recipes and you will understand why you should look into the Genetics mod.

betterquesting.name: Upgraded home
betterquesting.desc:
The Bee House can be used to stabilize mutations, for example if you have successfully bred two different bees, but the passive traits are different from the active ones. 

To actually breed those together to get a new species, you'll need something different - the Apiary. Building them will require a Carpenter and Impregnated frames, along with Seedoil and Creosote - quite a bit of industrialization! Or, if you're lucky, you can find a beekeeper villager to trade with for useful items. Maybe you can help the villagers *get lucky* to make more beekeeper villagers? If only Cupid and his bow were around...

Production rates in an empty Apiary are low - lower than a Bee House by quite a bit, in fact.  But the Apiary has two big advantages - Frames, and Automation. You can now use your Untreated or Impregnated frames in here to boost output - and the boost is multiplied. So 3 x2 frames gives you 2 * 2 * 2 = 8x extra output!

betterquesting.name: Mutatron
betterquesting.desc:
Mutations can be boring, they can be annoying, and most times, they are frustrating. With this machine, you will get a 100 percent pure bred mutation. If the combination of princess and drone can result in multiple mutations, the outcome is random. But who cares?

You can now upgrade your leftover Bees Advanced bags to Bees Expert in the last quest tab.

betterquesting.name: Genetic sampler
betterquesting.desc: With this machine, you can extract a random trait from any bee, sapling, butterfly or flower. The bee/sapling/butterfly/flower will be destroyed in this process. Each process requires an empty gene sample and some labware.

betterquesting.name: Diamondware
betterquesting.desc: Also known as labware. Be prepared. In order to do serious bee-work, you need stacks of diamonds. I'm not joking, stacks! Better start working on that diamond bee!

betterquesting.name: Genetic imprinter
betterquesting.desc: With this powerful machine, you can inject gene samples, which allows you to alter any aspect of your bee/tree or butterfly. The gene sample (or pattern) will not be destroyed. The success rate is 100%, and one labware is consumed per injection.

betterquesting.name: Genetic transposer
betterquesting.desc: DNA samples of species and/or traits are pretty valuable. You always should keep at least one of each effect/trait/species you get your hand on in a chest somewhere safe. By using this machine, you are able to copy any DNA sample, for the cost of an empty serum vial and some labware.

betterquesting.name: Advanced mutatron
betterquesting.desc: A more advanced version of the mutatron. It uses more energy to mutate a drone with a princess, but the mutation is a 100 percent success, and you can select which mutation you want to have. This machine is a must-have for high-tier bees.

betterquesting.name: Blank gene sample
betterquesting.desc:
To get the various traits from a bee, you need a lot of power, labware and an empty gene sample. You don't need a lot of those, as you can just throw them in a furnace to remove remaining DNA of traits you don't need or want. 

In the meantime you can start working with the Genetics mod, since we all know Gendustry is too easy... Genetics is used for bees, trees, and Botany flowers so it gets its own quest tab. Gendustry is really good for bees, but will require top tier equipment.

betterquesting.name: Genetic template
betterquesting.desc: Templates are used to combine multiple gene samples into one large batch. It can be used to apply multiple traits at once, but you can also replicate a bee from liquid DNA and protein, if you manage to fill all 13 traits in one template. These templates can also be copied, just like the small samples.

betterquesting.name: A rather cruel disposal
betterquesting.desc: You probably will end up with a lot of excess drones while doing bees. (Or saplings if you do trees). Instead of throwing them away, you could also turn them into... Something useful.

betterquesting.name: Arnie's blender
betterquesting.desc: They say, breakfast is the most important meal of the day. This machine turns raw meat into liquid protein, which is used to create bees from scratch.

betterquesting.name: And there shall be light
betterquesting.desc: Out of princesses to inject traits to? Too lazy to find hives and get more bees? Not a problem. With this nifty little device, you can use a ton of power, liquid DNA and protein to create any bee you wish to have. The only drawback is: All bees will be ignoble, which means they will die after a random amount of cycles.

betterquesting.name: Only the Best: Temperature 3
betterquesting.desc: On your way to awesome bees, you have to collect only the best traits available.

betterquesting.name: Only the Best: Humidity 3
betterquesting.desc: On your way to awesome bees, you have to collect only the best traits available.

betterquesting.name: Only the Best: Fertility 4
betterquesting.desc: On your way to awesome bees, you have to collect only the best traits available. Bees bees everywhere!

betterquesting.name: Highend species: Draconic
betterquesting.desc: On your way to awesome bees, you have to collect only the best traits available.

betterquesting.name: Highend species: Doctoral
betterquesting.desc: On your way to awesome bees, you have to collect only the best traits available.

betterquesting.name: Only the Best: Speed Fastest
betterquesting.desc: On your way to awesome bees, you have to collect only the best traits available. Buzz buzz buzz, working hard and really buzzing!

betterquesting.name: Highend species: Silicon
betterquesting.desc: On your way to awesome bees, you have to collect only the best traits available.

betterquesting.name: Only the Best: Rain
betterquesting.desc: On your way to awesome bees, you have to collect only the best traits available. Beekeeping in the rain!  Make sure to keep your GT machines covered!

betterquesting.name: Only the Best: Day and Night
betterquesting.desc: On your way to awesome bees, you have to collect only the best traits available. Bee working day and night, all night and all day long!

betterquesting.name: Only the Best: Cave
betterquesting.desc: On your way to awesome bees, you have to collect only the best traits available. Bees with Cave can work in housing that is covered - by more housing!

betterquesting.name: §5§lYou're gonna hate this #5
betterquesting.desc: The fifth item you'll need a lot of. For the microwave, the scanner, the precision laser engraver, etc.

betterquesting.name: §5§lYou're gonna hate this #6
betterquesting.desc: The sixth item you'll need a lot of. For the scanner and the seismic prospector.

betterquesting.name: §5§lScanning bees, crops and moooooore!
betterquesting.desc: Automate your bee, sapling, or crop scanning. Later on, this machine gets very useful for scanning high tier machine parts for the assembly line research data or to fill data orbs with data for the UU matter production. Data sticks with raw prospecting data need a scanner too.

betterquesting.name: §5§lDiesel, oil or maybe creosote?
betterquesting.desc:
You probably collected a ton of creosote and maybe even have built your first ELECTRIC blast furnace. Creosote will be a good fuel for the moment. So try to build a few of the combustion generators and use them besides steam as a secondary power source. Small generators will only use fuel if there is EU demand.

To extract the creosote from your coke ovens, you can use buckets or cells to do it by hand, or the TiCon faucet into GT fluid pipes, or an electric pump cover from You're Going to Hate This #2.

betterquesting.name: §4§5§lHydrogen, methane or some farts... (Natural gas)
betterquesting.desc:
Some centrifugal processes leave gases behind like hydrogen or methane. Centrifuge some brown and yellow limonite to get hydrogen or dump your unused food in a centrifuge to get methane gas. Wood will even give 60 mb per log. Maybe it's time to build a forestry tree farm. Or you can start refining oil into refinery gas or naphtha to burn.

Gas turbines produce half the pollution of combusion generators, but their fuels are generally not as efficient. Choice is up to you which power source you use.

betterquesting.name: §4§3§lPollution what....?
betterquesting.desc: If you are running your bricked blast furnace for a long time you will sometimes get headaches, nausea and other weird effects. Yes this is pollution... from making so much steel. If you can collect some rubber sheets, I will trade you a complete hazmat suit.

betterquesting.name: §1§2§lRedstone, early game processing
betterquesting.desc: Are you wondering how to process redstone without a macerator? Well you can mine it with a gregtech hammer and get the crushed ore. Then use with the hammer in the crafting table to get some impure redstone dust. After this, fill a cauldron with water and drop the dust in it - CTRL-Q drops a whole stack but you will need a new iron bucket as the fired clay bucket just isnt fit for the task. You will get pure redstone dust for your red alloy ingots.

betterquesting.name: §3§lLow tier wires
betterquesting.desc: Low tier wires like red alloy and tin can be made in a crafting table. Copper wire requires an alloy smelter. So let's make a mold for the rubber plates.

betterquesting.name: Time to kill (Witch)
betterquesting.desc: Witches bring stitches because they are always infernal and very dangerous. Be careful since they throw potions at you.

betterquesting.name: §5§lBasic ore washer
betterquesting.desc: Macerating ores usually doubles the output. If you want MOOOOOOORE, craft an ore washer and wash out some rare materials.

betterquesting.name: §5§lRound and round and round...
betterquesting.desc: After purification of your ore dust, you can centrifuge it to get even more byproducts out of the dust.

betterquesting.name: §5§lA truly sharp saw blade
betterquesting.desc: Combining cobalt brass and diamond dust makes a really sharp saw blade for your cutting machine.

betterquesting.name: §5§lA new alloy - Cobalt Brass
betterquesting.desc:
If you want to cut diamond blocks into plates, it's time to get a new alloy 'cobalt brass'.
First you need to make brass out of zinc (only found in small ores in the Overworld, in Nether Sphalerite, or as a centrifuge byproduct from tin or tetrahedrite) and copper. Mix it with aluminium and cobalt dust (can be centrifuged from various materials) to get the cobalt brass dust.

Now that you have come this far, we think that you are able to look up the ores that you need by yourself with the help of NEI.

betterquesting.name: §5§lWater and electricity, sounds fun and safe right?
betterquesting.desc: Using the power of water and electricity you can get even more out of your dusts.

betterquesting.name: §5§lC9H8O4...NaCl...H2O...
betterquesting.desc:
Want to make some cetane-boosted diesel, plastic or some chemical dyes? Then it's time to craft a chemical reactor.

§4Hint: You can use the battery slot and other extra slot in the GUI to store unused configuration circuits.

betterquesting.name: §5§lCompact? Or is it?
betterquesting.desc:
It is a compressor but that doesn't mean it is compact... 

§4Hint:
It is highly recommended to get one of these electric compressors, as the efficiency in terms of coal/steam used to compress something is a lot better when using EU.

betterquesting.name: §3§5§lSuction device... nice
betterquesting.desc:
I hope you are not thinking about what I am thinking you are thinking about... 

Hint:
It is highly recommended to get one of these, as the efficiency in terms of coal/steam used to extracting something is a lot better when using EU.

betterquesting.name: §5§lHello Baron, how is your black gold today?
betterquesting.desc:
During your travels you may have seen some of these huge oil spouts. Now it's time to go make a pump and put this black gold into tanks. Oil can be burned directly in a combustion generator or be refined for better fuels and crafting materials. 
Mining pipes are needed for pumping the oil.

Bring a combustion generator with you to power the pump. Thanks to the advancement of technology the pumping machine can auto output on top.

Stacking multiple pumps makes them work faster. In that case, oil has to be removed from the bottom of the stack using a pump cover.

Taller spouts have more oil! But for the LV pump, it is better to use the short spouts since it doesn't have much range. Save the taller spouts for MV pumps. 

These are GT machines, so remember to protect them (and their power sources!) from rain on any side. And set a waypoint with Journeymaps so you don't forget where you placed it!

betterquesting.name: §5§lYour oil is too Crude? Refine it!
betterquesting.desc: Burning oil in the combustion generator is a very inefficient way of producing power. Every bucket/cell of oil only gives you 20,000 EU. Time to try and refine it...

betterquesting.name: §5§lLight Sulfuric Fuel
betterquesting.desc: The first step is to distill your oil into light sulfuric fuel, that has a burn value of 40,000 EU.

betterquesting.name: §5§lLight fuel
betterquesting.desc:
By adding hydrogen to sulfuric light fuel in a chemical reactor you can produce some light fuel with the very high burn value of 320,000 EU.

The remaining hydrogen sulfide cells can be used later to produce some sulfuric acid for your TNT/iTNT or acid batteries.

In MV age you can make diesel out of light and heavy fuel.

betterquesting.name: §5§lH like Hydrogen... rest of the alphabet is too complicated...
betterquesting.desc: Centrifuge some brown or yellow limonite dust to get some hydrogen, or use an Electrolyser with some water to produce it in a fluid form.

betterquesting.name: §5§lHeavy Sulfuric fuel
betterquesting.desc: The second step is to distill your oil into heavy sulfuric fuel, that has a burn value of 40,000 EU.

betterquesting.name: §5§lHeavy fuel
betterquesting.desc:
By adding hydrogen to sulfuric heavy fuel in a chemical reactor you can produce some heavy fuel with the burn value of 200,000 EU.

The remaining hydrogen sulfide cells can be used later to produce some sulfuric acid for your TNT/iTNT or acid batteries.

In MV age you can make diesel out of heavy and light fuel.

betterquesting.name: §6§lDiesel fuel
betterquesting.desc: Mixing your light and heavy fuel together gives you some diesel. You need the MV mixer for it. It burns very well in the combustion generator with a burn value of 480,000 EU per cell.

betterquesting.name: §5§lHey DJ, Mix it!
betterquesting.desc:
The mixer is a very useful device. You can mix all kinds of fluids and items. Useful to prevent dust from falling to the ground when crafting - most mixer recipes give a slight boost over hand crafting!

§4Hint: You can use the battery slot and other extra slot in the GUI to store unused configuration circuits.

betterquesting.name: §5§lN like nitrogen... Hide, alphabet strikes again!
betterquesting.desc: You can get some nitrogen by centrifuging... air. This process takes a long time, especially at the LV tier.

betterquesting.name: §6§lGlyceryl trini...... what?
betterquesting.desc:
Kids, today we will make some glyceryl trinitrate (aka Nitroglycerin) with some glycerol.
    - Chemistry 101

betterquesting.name: §9§lNITRO! (Cetane-boosted diesel)
betterquesting.desc: 720,000 EU per cell. Yes, yes, this is very good! Make some cetane-boosted diesel fuel and power your Combustion Engine with it.

betterquesting.name: §3§lWhat can I put all these items in?
betterquesting.desc:
After you make your first steel you're able to craft the small backpack. In this bag you can put a lot of the stuff you want to carry around. With 36 slots it's a bit bigger than a small chest. Later you can make it even larger. You can put one on your back and set it to automatically pick up stuff. 

§4Check out the "Backpacks" control configuration "Open Backpacks" and remap it to a new key. 

§4The maximum you can have in your inventory at once is 4.

betterquesting.name: §6§lLow pressure boiler tank
betterquesting.desc:
